gadgets.name: Adepti Seeker's Stove
gadgets.effect: A portable stove that can be used to access Cooking when outside of combat.

gadgets.name: Anemo Treasure Compass
gadgets.effect: A compass that can be used in Mondstadt to search for nearby chests. If a chest is nearby, then it goes on cooldown for 30 seconds, otherwise, 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: Anemoculus Resonance Stone
gadgets.effect: A stone that can be used in Mondstadt to search for nearby Anemoculi.

gadgets.name: Condensed Resin
gadgets.effect: Can be used to revitalize Ley Line Blossoms from Ley Line Outcrops or Petrified Trees in Domains to receive 2 sets of rewards at one time.

gadgets.name: Geo Treasure Compass
gadgets.effect: A compass that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby chest. If a chest is nearby, then it goes on cooldown for 30 seconds, otherwise, 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: Geoculus Resonance Stone
gadgets.effect: A stone that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby Geoculi.

gadgets.name: Kamera
gadgets.effect: Allows pictures to be taken anywhere, even while fighting. Has no cooldown period.

gadgets.name: Kurious Kamera
gadgets.effect: Allows event-specific pictures to be taken anywhere. Has no cooldown period.
gadgets.source: Reward from Kurious Kamera World Quest

gadgets.name: NRE (Menu 30)
gadgets.effect: A bag with two slots, one for HP recovery food and the other for Revival type food, accessible from hotbar.

gadgets.name: Parametric Transformer
gadgets.effect: A device that can transmute up to 150 materials placed within to convert it into some other material. Use Elemental Attacks to generate energy for the transmutation. It has a cooldown of 7 days.
gadgets.source: Reward from Tianqiu Treasure Trail World Quest

gadgets.name: Portable Waypoint
gadgets.effect: Creates a temporary waypoint at current location for 7 days with a limit of 1 in the world.

gadgets.name: Special Kamera
gadgets.effect: Allows event-specific pictures to be taken anywhere. Has no cooldown period.
gadgets.source: Reward from Perfect Shot World Quest

gadgets.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
gadgets.effect: Reveals the presence of Iron Coins.

gadgets.name: Warming Bottle
gadgets.effect: Emits heat for a short period over a small area to diminish the effect of Sheer Cold.

gadgets.name: Wind Catcher
gadgets.effect: A bottle that is able to hold up to 5 Anemograna and use their energy to create wind currents. Has a cooldown of 100 seconds and cannot be used in combat.
